calculations.name: Credit/IR
calculations.tableau_expression:
case [SOURCE_ID]
when 32 then 1    //1 Means Rates, 0 means credit
when 37 then 0
else if [INSTRUMENT_TYPE]= "CDS" then 0 else 1 END END

calculation_context.Expression:
case [SOURCE_ID]
when 32 then 1    //1 Means Rates, 0 means credit
when 37 then 0
else if [INSTRUMENT_TYPE]= "CDS" then 0 else 1 END END
